# perShareAccessRequestResultBlock

**Instance Property**

A block called once for each share URL processed by the server.

## Declaration

```swift
var perShareAccessRequestResultBlock: ((URL, Result<Void, any Error>) -> Void)? { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **shareURL**: The URL of the processed share.
- **result**: A result indicating success (`Void`) or an error.

## Discussion

Use this block to handle results individually for each requested share.

Each [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKOperation] instance uses a private serial queue for callback block invocations. This queue ensures serialized execution and thread safety for mutable state shared within the operation’s blocks. Any mutable state should not be concurrently accessed outside these callback blocks.
title: perShareAccessRequestResultBlock
